column4: anyone? i've scanned forums and manuals and not much is very relevant... just want a sense of direction
are you trying to use ndiswrapper?

you might post the problem you had and details about your system on the thread you mentioned, and/or here.  The instructions I used to get my bcm4310 (not 4318) card working are here: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=297092
sorry I can't help, the instructions I used required downloading some stuff using apt-get, but your ethernet card is broken
